mapper.select: SELECT usm.user_shop_id,usm.create_time,usm.point, personinfo.user_id ,personinfo.name, shop.shop_id,shop.shop_name FROM tb_user_shop_map as usm , tb_shop as shop ,tb_person_info as personinfo WHERE usm.user_id=personinfo.user_id AND usm.shop_id=shop.shop_id AND usm.user_id= #{userId} AND usm.shop_id= #{shopId}
